stimulusHtml: Maria and Julian Mart√≠nez developed a black-on-black pottery technique that included the creation of a smooth, high-gloss surface finish, which was achieved by
choicesHtml: applying slip and polishing it with a smooth stone
kneading ground charcoal into terra cotta clay
firing the pieces in an electric kiln at high temperatures
stenciling surface designs using varnish and airbrush
